title: Pytorch 0.4.0 documentation typo for batchnorm's momentum parameter
body_html:
Hi, I found a typo in the pytorch 0.4.0's Batchnorm documentation.
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=batchnorm2d#torch.nn.BatchNorm2d

Different from 0.3.x below equation explanation is added

but, below term should be

corrected as

Since it is previous step's statistics term.
So, "new" should be removed or be replaced as "old".

This typo is in every box within BatchNorm1d, 2d etc...

body:
Hi, I found a typo in the pytorch 0.4.0's Batchnorm documentation.
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=batchnorm2d#torch.nn.BatchNorm2d

Different from 0.3.x below equation explanation is added

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26222919/37128888-88de89d4-22bf-11e8-9153-1fbec0f6be0c.png)

but, below term should be 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26222919/37128902-abdb3950-22bf-11e8-8f14-d82db4b3b0be.png)

corrected as

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26222919/37129017-3974a756-22c0-11e8-837b-64b6e1a541ac.png)

Since it is previous step's statistics term.
So, "new" should be removed or be replaced as "old".

This typo is in every box within BatchNorm1d, 2d etc...
